TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1922: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1928), 3 vols., Vol 2, pp. 273
TEI.2.document_title: J M Viesca to Ramon Musquiz, 10-24-1829

barker_notes.barker_summary: José Maria Yiesca to Ramon Musquiz, Saltillo, October 24, 1829. Inquiring whether Austin had been repaid expenses advanced in 1826 in making topographical survey of Galveston Bay. (Omitted.)
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 273

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*José Maria Yiesca to Ramon Musquiz, Saltillo, October 24, 1829. Inquiring whether Austin had been repaid expenses advanced in 1826 in making topographical survey of Galveston Bay. (Omitted.)*/p* */div1*

*p**location_mentioned*Saltillo*/location_mentioned*, *date_mentioned n="10-24-1829">October 24, 1829.*/date_mentioned**/p* *p*See Calendar.*/p*
